name: Foodie Furry Friends
description:
♡ Welcome to the cutest shop in all the lands ♡

Our job here is to satisfy our customers by giving them the pet they've always wanted! Don't worry, Squid Cook is here to help you out preparing the pets!

Thank you for working with us, below is what you need to do to make sure our customers are happy!

♡ How to play ♡
  • Find out what the customer wants;
  • Select all the ingredients needed;
  • Press the mix button on the machine so that Squid Cook (also known as Takoyaki Octopoda) can prepare the animal!

Now go and make sure our customers have the pet they want to keep them company!

Thank you, once again, for working with us!

♡ The Team ♡

This game was made for the GDT Christmas Jam 2022 by:

  • Gonçalo Goulão - Artist
  • João Pamplona - Programming and Sound Design
  • Paulina Wykowska - Programming and Artist

We are part of a college game dev group called GameDev Técnico.

You can find us here!

♡ About the jam ♡

This game was made as a gift for one of the teams that participated! We received a letter from them, without knowing who it was from. We then had to find a way to make their dreams come true with our game! You can check out the letter below:

We really hope they'll like it! We'll update y'all when they receive it :)
